General.Name: MSP Steel & Power Limited
General.Description: MSP Steel & Power Limited, together with its subsidiaries, manufactures and sells iron and steel products in India and internationally. The company provides TMT bars, MS billets, sponge iron, and pellets, as well as structural steel products, such as beams, channels, angles, and round bars for industrial, infrastructural, and agricultural sectors. It also offers various pipes, such as black, galvanized, pre-galvanized steel, square, and rectangular hollow sections pipes. In addition, the company engages in the power generation business; manufacturing and sale of cement and clinker products; and production of minerals and its bye-products. MSP Steel & Power Limited was incorporated in 1968 and is based in Kolkata, India.
